text: The 1951 Fresno State Bulldogs football team represented Fresno State CollegeCalifornia State University, Fresno was known as Fresno State College from 1949 to 1971. during the 1951 college football season. The Bulldogs competed as an Independent in the 1951 season. The team was led by second-year head coach Duke Jacobs and played home games at Ratcliffe Stadium on the campus of Fresno City College in Fresno, California. They finished the season with a record of five wins and five losses (5–5). ==Schedule== ==Team players in the NFL== No Fresno State Bulldogs were selected in the 1952 NFL Draft. ==Notes== ==References== Fresno State Bulldogs Category:Fresno State Bulldogs football seasons Fresno State Bulldogs f
